lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Can we count on you when the deal sours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have far more allegiance to you "than I do any Empire or Dynasty, "for I have not any for either."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we're going to go ahead and end it there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget guys, we love you all very much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get home safe! Mic's still on.
